CmdLine: apt-get update   && curl --silent --location https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | bash -  && apt-get install -y -f vim apt-utils git build-essential flex bison libgmp-dev libssl-dev cmake nodejs net-tools expect && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && echo "download golang deps"   && mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x   && cd $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x   && git clone https://go.googlesource.com/crypto  --depth 1   && git clone https://go.googlesource.com/tools  --depth 1   && git clone https://go.googlesource.com/sys --depth 1   && git clone https://go.googlesource.com/text --depth 1   && git clone https://go.googlesource.com/net --depth 1   && mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/google.golang.org   && cd $GOPATH/src/google.golang.org   && git clone https://github.com/grpc/grpc-go.git grpc  --depth 1   && git clone https://github.com/google/go-genproto.git genproto  --depth 1   && echo "download ipfs deps"   && echo "download github.com/cheekybits/genny ..."   && go get -u github.com/cheekybits/genny   && echo "download github.com/hashicorp/golang-lru ..."   && go get -u github.com/hashicorp/golang-lru   && echo "download github.com/lucas-clemente/aes12  ..."   && go get -u github.com/lucas-clemente/aes12   && echo "download github.com/lucas-clemente/quic-go-certificates ..."   && go get -u github.com/lucas-clemente/quic-go-certificates   && echo "download github.com/golang/protobuf ..."   && git clone https://github.com/golang/protobuf.git /go/src/github.com/golang/protobuf --depth 1    && echo "download github.com/gogo/protobuf ..."   && git clone https://github.com/gogo/protobuf.git /go/src/github.com/gogo/protobuf --depth 1    && echo "download github.com/ncw/gmp ..."   && git clone https://github.com/ncw/gmp.git /go/src/github.com/ncw/gmp --depth 1    && echo "download tendeermint deps"   && echo "github.com/go-kit/kit ..."   && git clone https://github.com/go-kit/kit.git /go/src/github.com/go-kit/kit --depth 1 && echo "download github.com/go-logfmt/logfmt ..."   && go get -u github.com/go-logfmt/logfmt   && echo "download github.com/gorilla/websocket ..."   && go get -u github.com/gorilla/websocket   && echo "download github.com/rcrowley/go-metrics ..."   && go get -u github.com/rcrowley/go-metrics   && echo "download github.com/syndtr/goleveldb ..."   && git clone https://github.com/syndtr/goleveldb.git /go/src/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb  --depth 1 && echo "download github.com/golang/snappy ..."   && go get -u github.com/golang/snappy   && echo "download github.com/rs/cors ..."   && go get -u github.com/rs/cors   && echo "download github.com/spf13/cobra ..."   && go get -u github.com/spf13/cobra   && echo "download github.com/spf13/viper ..."   && go get -u github.com/spf13/viper   && echo "download github.com/tendermint/go-amino ..."   && go get -u github.com/tendermint/go-amino   && echo "download github.com/btcsuite/btcd ..."   && go get -u github.com/btcsuite/btcd   && echo "download github.com/prometheus/client_golang ..."   && git clone https://github.com/prometheus/client_golang.git /go/src/github.com/prometheus/client_golang --depth 1 && echo "download github.com/prometheus/client_model  ..."   && git clone https://github.com/prometheus/client_model.git /go/src/github.com/prometheus/client_model --depth 1 && echo "download github.com/prometheus/common ..."   && git clone https://github.com/prometheus/common.git /go/src/github.com/prometheus/common --depth 1 && echo "download github.com/prometheus/procfs ..."   && go get -u github.com/prometheus/procfs   && echo "download github.com/pkg/errors  ..."   && go get -u github.com/pkg/errors   && echo "download github.com/beorn7/perks  ..."   && git clone https://github.com/beorn7/perks.git /go/src/github.com/beorn7/perks --depth 1  && echo "download github.com/matttproud/golang_protobuf_extensions ..."   && git clone https://github.com/matttproud/golang_protobuf_extensions.git /go/src/github.com/matttproud/golang_protobuf_extensions --depth 1    && echo "download github.com/bifurcation/mint  ..."   && go get -u github.com/bifurcation/mint    && echo "reset mint for compile"    && cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/bifurcation/mint    && git reset --hard 824af65410658916142a7600349144e1289f2110    && echo "download github.com/xcshuan/go-mefs-api ..."   && git clone https://github.com/xcshuan/go-mefs-api.git /go/src/github.com/xcshuan/go-mefs-api --depth 1    && echo "download tendermint source"   && mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/tendermint   && cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/tendermint   && git clone https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint.git   && echo "reset tendermint for compile"    && cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/tendermint/tendermint    && git reset --hard 4253e67c07c69be6d7f7263ab03944ce30a9fc90    && echo "download ethereum source"   && mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/ethereum   && cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/ethereum   && git clone https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum.git    && echo "install mcl" && mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/mcl   && cd $GOPATH/src/mcl   && git clone https://github.com/herumi/mcl.git   && cd mcl   && mkdir build   && cd build   && cmake ..   && make -j 24   && make install   && ldconfig   && echo "install mefs-test" && echo "mefs-http-api-test version 0.0.62"   && mkdir -p $GOPATH/mefs-http-api-test  && cd $GOPATH/mefs-http-api-test   && npm install mefs-http-client   && echo "install golangci-lint" && curl -sfL https://install.goreleaser.com/github.com/golangci/golangci-lint.sh | sh -s -- -b $(go env GOPATH)/bin v1.17.1  && echo "download github.com/golang/mock/gomock ..."   && go get -u github.com/golang/mock/gomock  && echo "download github.com/onsi/gomega ..."   && go get -u github.com/onsi/gomega     && echo "download gopkg.in/check.v1 ..."   && go get -u gopkg.in/check.v1  && echo "download github.com/onsi/ginkgo ..."   && go get -u github.com/onsi/ginkgo     && echo "download github.com/jbenet/go-cienv ..."   && go get -u github.com/jbenet/go-cienv     && echo "download gopkg.in/cheggaaa/pb.v1 ..."   && go get -u gopkg.in/cheggaaa/pb.v1    && echo "download github.com/lucas-clemente/quic-clients ..."   && go get -u github.com/lucas-clemente/quic-clients     && echo "download github.com/smartystreets/goconvey/convey ..."   && go get -u github.com/smartystreets/goconvey/convey   && echo "download github.com/warpfork/go-wish ..."   && go get -u get -u github.com/dustin/go-humanize
